Characters of true blessednesse delivered in a sermon preached at Saint Maries Church in Dover. Sep. 21. 1637. At the funeral of Mrs. Alice Percivall, wife of Anthony Percivall Esquire. By Iohn Reading. Reading, John, 1588-1667.
[10], 60, 63-146 p.
Printed by E. G[riffin] for Ioyce Norton and Ric. Whitakers, at the signe of the Kings Armes in Saint Pauls Church yard, London : 1638.
A sermon. Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
